title: Rogers isp high latency starting today.
body:
Starting today i have been getting 80-200ms when i normally get 30-40ms. I am in ontario and it seems to be anything that is going west i have issues with. i have been testing my latency with other games to confirm this. my latency is high in ow and league but is normal in wow (a NY server i play on) and on my mumble server also hosted in NY. 

I am wondering if someone from riot can pass this info onto rogers as it seems like a routing issue with them and they will probably listen to you over me. thank you

Tracing route to INTEL_CE_LINUX [192.64.170.1]
over a maximum of 30 hops:

  1     4 ms     2 ms     2 ms  INTEL_CE_LINUX [192.168.0.1] 
  2    37 ms    27 ms    12 ms  INTEL_CE_LINUX [99.228.0.1] 
  3    13 ms    14 ms    12 ms  vl-201.gw03.baal.phub.net.cable.rogers.com [66.185.90.177] 
  4    22 ms    17 ms    28 ms  INTEL_CE_LINUX [24.156.147.129] 
  5    28 ms    22 ms    16 ms  INTEL_CE_LINUX [24.156.144.122] 
  6    24 ms    25 ms    30 ms  INTEL_CE_LINUX [209.148.230.138] 
  7   141 ms   159 ms   159 ms  eqix-ch2.chi01.riotdirect.net [206.223.119.235] 
  8   168 ms   179 ms   169 ms  INTEL_CE_LINUX [104.160.131.44] 
  9   178 ms   153 ms   186 ms  INTEL_CE_LINUX [104.160.131.101] 
 10     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 11

replies.body: well at least i know now that it's not just me.
OMG ME TOO! I was freaking out too.
Seems to be the same for me as of this afternoon. Went from 25ish to 160+, dropped to around 80 for a bit but is now back around 180.

I'm used to 27ms and now its like 100-200ms. Rogers said everything is fine. not sure what is going on... I guess no LoL tonight... :(

I am in Thornhill area

I have also checked with Rogers and they said everything is normal on their end..

Hey guys, is this issue still going on?  I haven't see any issues server side, but there are quite a few reports here.  We can run some logs to get more visibility on what's going on, and see what we can do from there.  Download [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) and run a traceroute to the NA game server:  104.160.131.1

Run it for a few minutes, then post your logs here.  We can take a look and pinpoint the origin of the issue, and get this figured out.
hello the issue seemed to be resolved around 12:30 am est for me and still seems to be ok. I am back to 27-35 ms. i will post here again if the issue returns.
I'm relieved to hear that!  Thanks for the update on this!
Same here, regularly get around 29ms, now up to around 200, really annoying
Yep...  in the GTA with rogers, 25 ping to 200 ping.
I am still having this issue: toronto with teksavvy

Same thing for me. I'm in Mississauga on Rogers. Getting almost 200MS all day. So annoying. Riot, please address this as it definitely isn't me.

1     *        1 ms     1 ms  x.x.x.x.com [x.x.x.x]
  2    12 ms    11 ms    10 ms  INTEL_CE_LINUX [99.236.96.1]
  3    13 ms    17 ms     9 ms  8081-dgw01.wlfdle.rmgt.net.rogers.com [67.231.222.233]
  4    16 ms    19 ms    14 ms  3000-dgw02.wlfdle.rmgt.net.rogers.com [209.148.232.46]
  5    21 ms    19 ms    12 ms  INTEL_CE_LINUX [209.148.232.41]
  6    24 ms    20 ms    12 ms  INTEL_CE_LINUX [209.148.230.210]
  7    28 ms    29 ms    20 ms  INTEL_CE_LINUX [209.148.230.138]
  8   130 ms   128 ms   120 ms  eqix-ch2.chi01.riotdirect.net [206.223.119.235]
  9   137 ms   138 ms   124 ms  INTEL_CE_LINUX [104.160.131.46]
 10   139 ms   141 ms   138 ms  INTEL_CE_LINUX [104.160.131.101]
 11   154 ms   148 ms   159 ms  INTEL_CE_LINUX [192.64.170.1]
Same with me hovering around 100-250ms and its normally around 20ms.
Me too, I went from 30 right up to 200 as well. Hopefully this is just a fluke and it'll get better, otherwise I may need to swap ISP.

yea same, it happened at around 6:30ish. My friend started to lag out as well and he is on fido. Despite this we both had the same ping 
I restarted my pc and it went down to 90-150, its still unplayable.
Thankfully it was in flex game , was about to solo duo my series but thank god i didnt
All I wanted to do was get some motherfkin elo, but I cant because of this 200 ping
